    # theme.toml template for a Hugo theme # See github.com/gohugoio/hugoThemes#themetoml for an example

    name = “Fasademesteren” license = “MIT” licenselink = “github.com/yourname/yourtheme/blob/master/LICENSE” description = “” homepage = “example.com/” tags = [] features = [] min_version = “0.41.0”

    author

    name = “” homepage = “”

    # If porting an existing theme

    name = “” homepage = “” repo = “”
